message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor. Let's make this fair and split closer to even, with a slight advantage for me to make up for the inflation.
Considering the inflation, my new offer is slightly more generous. Take it before the money loses more value!
Time is running out and the money is losing value! Let's split it evenly and end this.
